scripts.build: tsc && npm run create:bundle && npm run minify:bundle && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:html && npm run cleanup && npm run validate
scripts.minify:js: terser dist/app.js -o dist/app.min.js -c passes=3,drop_console=true,drop_debugger=true,pure_funcs=['console.log','console.warn'] -m toplevel=true,properties=true,reserved=['AudioContext','webkitAudioContext'] && terser dist/audio-player.js -o dist/audio-player.min.js -c passes=3,drop_console=true,drop_debugger=true -m toplevel=true,properties=true,reserved=['AudioContext','webkitAudioContext'] && terser dist/music-theory.js -o dist/music-theory.min.js -c passes=3,drop_console=true,drop_debugger=true -m toplevel=true,properties=true && terser dist/types.js -o dist/types.min.js -c passes=3,drop_console=true,drop_debugger=true -m toplevel=true,properties=true
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run test && npm run build
